original_text: Thou art my hiding place; thou shalt preserve me from trouble; thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance. Selah.
korean_text: 주는 나의 은신처이오니 환난에서 나를 보호하시고 구원의 노래로 나를 두르시리이다 (셀라)

sentences.original_text: thou shalt preserve me from trouble
thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance
